original_title: Thomas & Friends: Team Up with Thomas
overview: Join Thomas & Friends for more heartwarming tales on the tracks filled with fun adventures, important lessons and helpful friends.  There is fun around every turn with a welcoming party, an exciting festival, a puppet show and even a surprise snowstorm.  But when friends encounter unexpected obstacles, they quickly discover that friendship means choosing cooperation over competition.  So get on board for a journey among friends - with Thomas & Friends!
title: Thomas & Friends: Team Up with Thomas
